price: Kisha nikawatangazia kwa kelele, tena nikasema nao kwa siri.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا
footnotes: kisha nikaudhihirisha wito kwa namna moja, na nikawaita kisirisiri kwa namna nyengine, ili nijaribu kila njia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma innī aʿlantu lahum wa-asrartu lahum is'rāran
